attributes.action: stop the planned closing of A&E departments in four west london hospitals
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the planned closure of A&E departments at four West London hospitals ,

1/Ealing hospital
2/Central middlesex hospital
3/Charing cross hospital
4/Hammersmith hospital

all four hospitals have planned A&E closures and we want the government to stop the planned closures of all A&E departments mentioned
